name: Universal_Button
description: Generic multi-button handler with debounce and short/long/double press events plus optional latching. Pluggable readers (GPIO/expanders), per-button overrides (timing/polarity/enable incl. double_click_ms + latch config), enum-friendly API, helpers, and optional time source injection for Arduino-free/RTOS use. Includes latch control APIs (setLatched/clearAllLatched/clearLatchedMask) for system-level policies like global reset.
keywords: button, debounce, short-press, long-press, double-click, double-press, latch, latching, toggle, set, reset, event, input, gpio, mcp23017, expander, arduino, esp32, rtos, freertos, time, millis, timefn, latchedmask, setlatched, clearalllatched, clearlatchedmask, global-reset
